title: Understanding the Addition Method
text: The addition (or elimination) method involves adding the two equations in the system to eliminate one of the variables. This helps in solving for the remaining variable.

title: Aligning Variables
text: Before adding the two equations, you want to set them up so that when they are added, one of the variables is eliminated. This might involve multiplying one or both equations by a number to align the coefficients of one variable.
